Ensure at least one file named /var/lib/kube-proxy/kubeconfig exists and is owned by 0:0

Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/kubelet.conf exists and is owned by 0:0

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure that the --anonymous-auth argument is set to false
Ensure that the --authorization-mode argument is not set to AlwaysAllow
Ensure that the --client-ca-file argument is set as appropriate
Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_AUTHZ_ARGS.+--client-ca-file=.+$
Ensure that the --read-only-port argument is set to 0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.+--read-only-port=0.+$
Ensure that the --streaming-connection-idle-timeout argument is not set to 0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.+--streaming-connection-idle-timeout=0.+$
Ensure that the --protect-kernel-defaults argument is set to true
Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.+--protect-kernel-defaults=true.+$
Ensure that the --make-iptables-util-chains argument is set to true
Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.--make-iptables-util-chains=true.+$
Ensure no file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.+--event-qps=0.+$
Ensure that the --tls-cert-file and --tls-private-key-file arguments are set as appropriate
Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_CERTIFICATE_ARGS.+--tls-cert-file=.+$
Ensure that the --rotate-certificates argument is not set to false
Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_CERTIFICATE_ARGS.+--rotate-certificates=true.+$
Ensure that the RotateKubeletServerCertificate argument is set to true
Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_.+CERTIFICATE_ARGS.+--feature-gates=RotateKubeletServerCertificate=true.+$

Ensure 'kubectl get pods -o=json' output Pattern Match 'seccomp.security.alpha.kubernetes.io/pod: docker/default' (string)
Ensure Image Vulnerability Scanning using GCR Container Analysis or a third party provider
Ensure GKE clusters are not running using the Compute Engine default service account
Ensure Kubernetes Secrets are encrypted using keys managed in Cloud KMS
Ensure legacy Compute Engine instance metadata APIs are Disabled

Ensure Node Auto-Repair is enabled for GKE nodes

Ensure 'gcloud beta container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME \ --format json | jq '.shieldedNodes'' output Pattern Match 'enabled": true' (string)

Enable VPC Flow Logs and Intranode Visibility

Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.masterAuthorizedNetworksConfig'' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)

Ensure clusters are created with Private Nodes
Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.networkPolicy'' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
Ensure Stackdriver Kubernetes Logging and Monitoring is Enabled
Ensure Stackdriver Kubernetes Logging and Monitoring is Enabled
Ensure Basic Authentication using static passwords is Disabled
Ensure authentication using Client Certificates is Disabled
Ensure Legacy Authorization (ABAC) is Disabled
Ensure Kubernetes Web UI is Disabled
Ensure that Alpha clusters are not used for production workloads
Ensure Pod Security Policy is Enabled and set as appropriate
Ensure use of Binary Authorization

file_state.comment: Ensure that the proxy kubeconfig file permissions are set to 644 or more restrictive
Ensure at least one file named /var/lib/kube-proxy/kubeconfig exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /var/lib/kubelet/config.yaml exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/kubelet.conf exists and is owned by 0:0
